titleStmt.title: Admirable and notable prophesies vttered in former times by 24. famous Romain-Catholickes, concerning the Church of Rome's defection, tribulation, and reformation / written first in Latine, & now published in the English tongue, both by Iames Maxwell ...
titleStmt.author: Maxwell, James, b. 1581.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.A. for W. Harper, and T. Harper, and are to be sold at their shop in S. Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: their shop in S. Paules Churchyard
